name: audience_quarter_performance_matrix
description:
Analyzes audience performance metrics over the current quarter (last 3 months of data).
Calculates key performance indicators (KPIs) like conversion rate, ROI, acquisition cost, and CTR
for combinations of Company, Target Audience, and a tertiary dimension (Location, Language, or Campaign Goal).
Provides comparative metrics against company, audience, dimension, and global averages.
Includes normalized metrics, a weighted composite score for ranking, and a flag for top performers.
Designed for use in performance matrix heatmaps and comparative visualizations.

columns.name: Company
columns.description: Name of the company running the campaigns. Primary dimension.

columns.name: Target_Audience
columns.description: Specific audience segment targeted by the campaigns within the company. Secondary dimension.

columns.name: dimension_value
columns.description: The specific value of the dimension being analyzed (e.g., a specific location, language, or campaign goal). Tertiary dimension value.

columns.name: dimension_type
columns.description: Indicates the type of dimension represented by `dimension_value` ('location', 'language', 'goal'). Tertiary dimension type.

columns.name: campaign_count
columns.description: Number of campaigns contributing to this specific combination in the current quarter.

columns.name: avg_conversion_rate
columns.description: Average conversion rate for this combination in the current quarter.

columns.name: avg_roi
columns.description: Average Return on Investment (ROI) for this combination in the current quarter.

columns.name: avg_acquisition_cost
columns.description: Average cost to acquire a customer/lead for this combination in the current quarter.

columns.name: avg_ctr
columns.description: Average Click-Through Rate (CTR) for this combination in the current quarter.

columns.name: company_avg_conversion_rate
columns.description: Average conversion rate across all audiences and dimensions for this company in the current quarter.

columns.name: company_avg_roi
columns.description: Average ROI across all audiences and dimensions for this company in the current quarter.

columns.name: company_avg_acquisition_cost
columns.description: Average acquisition cost across all audiences and dimensions for this company in the current quarter.

columns.name: company_avg_ctr
columns.description: Average CTR across all audiences and dimensions for this company in the current quarter.

columns.name: audience_avg_conversion_rate
columns.description: Average conversion rate for this specific Company-Target_Audience pair across all dimensions in the current quarter.

columns.name: audience_avg_roi
columns.description: Average ROI for this specific Company-Target_Audience pair across all dimensions in the current quarter.

columns.name: audience_avg_acquisition_cost
columns.description: Average acquisition cost for this specific Company-Target_Audience pair across all dimensions in the current quarter.

columns.name: audience_avg_ctr
columns.description: Average CTR for this specific Company-Target_Audience pair across all dimensions in the current quarter.

columns.name: dimension_avg_conversion_rate
columns.description: Average conversion rate for this specific Company-Dimension combination across all audiences in the current quarter.

columns.name: dimension_avg_roi
columns.description: Average ROI for this specific Company-Dimension combination across all audiences in the current quarter.

columns.name: dimension_avg_acquisition_cost
columns.description: Average acquisition cost for this specific Company-Dimension combination across all audiences in the current quarter.

columns.name: dimension_avg_ctr
columns.description: Average CTR for this specific Company-Dimension combination across all audiences in the current quarter.

columns.name: global_avg_conversion_rate
columns.description: Global average conversion rate across all combinations in the current quarter.

columns.name: global_avg_roi
columns.description: Global average ROI across all combinations in the current quarter.

columns.name: global_avg_acquisition_cost
columns.description: Global average acquisition cost across all combinations in the current quarter.

columns.name: global_avg_ctr
columns.description: Global average CTR across all combinations in the current quarter.

columns.name: conversion_rate_vs_company_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference between the combination's conversion rate and the company's average conversion rate. ((avg_conv_rate / company_avg_conv_rate) - 1)

columns.name: roi_vs_company_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference between the combination's ROI and the company's average ROI. ((avg_roi / company_avg_roi) - 1)

columns.name: acquisition_cost_vs_company_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference showing how much lower the combination's acquisition cost is compared to the company average (inverted for positive = better). ((company_avg_acq_cost / avg_acq_cost) - 1)

columns.name: ctr_vs_company_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference between the combination's CTR and the company's average CTR. ((avg_ctr / company_avg_ctr) - 1)

columns.name: conversion_rate_vs_audience_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference between the combination's conversion rate and the average for its specific Company-Audience pair.

columns.name: roi_vs_audience_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference between the combination's ROI and the average for its specific Company-Audience pair.

columns.name: acquisition_cost_vs_audience_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference showing how much lower the combination's acquisition cost is compared to the average for its specific Company-Audience pair (inverted).

columns.name: ctr_vs_audience_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference between the combination's CTR and the average for its specific Company-Audience pair.

columns.name: conversion_rate_vs_dimension_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference between the combination's conversion rate and the average for its specific Company-Dimension pair.

columns.name: roi_vs_dimension_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference between the combination's ROI and the average for its specific Company-Dimension pair.

columns.name: acquisition_cost_vs_dimension_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference showing how much lower the combination's acquisition cost is compared to the average for its specific Company-Dimension pair (inverted).

columns.name: ctr_vs_dimension_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference between the combination's CTR and the average for its specific Company-Dimension pair.

columns.name: conversion_rate_vs_global_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference between the combination's conversion rate and the global average conversion rate.

columns.name: roi_vs_global_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference between the combination's ROI and the global average ROI.

columns.name: acquisition_cost_vs_global_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference showing how much lower the combination's acquisition cost is compared to the global average (inverted).

columns.name: ctr_vs_global_avg
columns.description: Percentage difference between the combination's CTR and the global average CTR.

columns.name: normalized_conversion_rate
columns.description: Combination's average conversion rate normalized to a 0-1 scale across all combinations in the dataset.

columns.name: normalized_roi
columns.description: Combination's average ROI normalized to a 0-1 scale across all combinations in the dataset.

columns.name: normalized_acquisition_cost
columns.description: Combination's average acquisition cost normalized to a 0-1 scale (inverted, so 1 is best/lowest cost) across all combinations.

columns.name: normalized_ctr
columns.description: Combination's average CTR normalized to a 0-1 scale across all combinations in the dataset.

columns.name: composite_score
columns.description: Weighted score (0-1) combining normalized metrics to rank overall performance. Weights: ROI(40%), ConvRate(30%), AcqCost(20%), CTR(10%). Higher is better.

columns.name: is_top_performer
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if this combination ranks in the top 10% based on the composite score within its dimension type (location, language, or goal).
